[ Act No. 3341, December 07, 1926 ]
AN ACT MAKING APPROPRIATIONS FOR PUBLIC WORKS.

Section 1. Section 2. All balances of the several appropriations made by this Act the destination of which has not been determined by proper authority on July thirtieth, nineteen hundred and twenty-seven, and all balances of appropriations remaining unexpended on July thirtieth, nineteen hundred and twenty-eight, shall revert to the unappropriated funds in the Insular Treasury, and thereafter shall not be available for expenditure except upon appropriation by the Legislature.ℒαwρhi৷
Section 3. The sums appropriated by paragraphs (a), (h), (II), (u), (cc), (dd), (ee), (kk), and (l-l) shall be distributed in the discretion of the Secretary of Commerce and Communications, but those appropriated in the other paragraphs, except the appropriation for the completion of the Manila Post-office Building , shall be available for immediate expenditure by the Director of Public Works.
Section 4. This Act shall take effect on January first, nineteen hundred and twenty-seven.
Approved, December 7, 1926 .
